text: I teach undergraduate computer science students various subjects, including HTML/CSS, JavaScript, Java, SQL, and software engineering fundamentals, while also facilitating lab sessions and maintaining organized tutoring environments in the computer lab to enhance learning and productivity.

I created a human resource application from scratch to manage leave requests and improved an inventory management system by adding features and optimizing performance. Additionally, I provided mentorship to a junior team member, guiding them in project workflow and coding tasks.
Developed a dynamic blueprint of a software engineering company website using GatsbyJS that showcases the expertise and capabilities of a software engineering firm.
Completed undergraduate degree from Pulchowk Campus (Tribhuvan University) in Electronics and Communication Engineering.
